title: 155 TIMMINS Street Unit# 402, North Bay, ON P1B9K8 Condo For Sale | RE/MAX | 40524231
text: Property Description for 155 TIMMINS Street Unit# 402 Welcome to luxury waterfront living at its finest! This stunning condo, nestled in the heart of North Bay, offers an unparalleled blend of comfort, style, and convenience. With just under 2000 square feet of meticulously designed living space, this residence is a haven for those seeking a sophisticated and serene waterfront lifestyle. This corner unit boasts two spacious bedrooms plus a versatile den, providing ample space for both relaxation and productivity. Natural light floods the interior with a southern exposure, offering breathtaking views of the North Bay waterfront. Imagine waking up to the soothing sights of sparkling water and serene landscapes each day. The den, with its versatile layout, can be transformed into a home office, library, or cozy retreat. In addition to the luxurious interiors, this condo comes with the added convenience of two covered parking spaces, ensuring hassle-free access for your vehicles. As if that weren't enough, residents have exclusive access to a range of amenities, including an indoor pool for year-round relaxation and a tennis court for those who enjoy an active lifestyle.
